# CNSpatialAudioRenderingStyle.cinematicForegroundStem

**Case**

Isolates all voices and places them in a mono stem. There is no ambience stem.

## Declaration

```swift
case cinematicForegroundStem
```
title: CNSpatialAudioRenderingStyle.cinematicForegroundStem
